author: CNA
title: In mourning, actor Gary Sinise extols his son’s musical legacy, love of the Catholic faith | Catholic News Agency
text: ACI Prensa Staff, Feb 29, 2024 / 18:00 pm Gary Sinise, the Catholic actor who played Lt. Dan in the 1994 movie “Forrest Gump,” announced the death of his 33-year-old son Mac, the victim of a rare form of cancer. Sinise, also known for his starring role in the television series “CSI: New York,” shared the sad news this week, more than five years after Mac was diagnosed with chordoma, a rare type of bone cancer that, [according to the Mayo Clinic](https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/chordoma/cdc-20355401?gclsrc=aw.ds&&mc_id=google&campaign=1668886049&geo=9028752&kw=whats%20chordoma&ad=323024497836&network=g&sitetarget=&adgroup=63439334126&extension=&target=kwd-1282975787974&matchtype=p&device=c&account=1733789621&invsrc=neuro&placementsite=enterprise&gclid=Cj0KCQiA84CvBhCaARIsAMkAvkKEoTQDHOtGerwHUuOyIO1uXRDPrST7oti5gMx0uNyGPOyoPAdT9JsaAnvEEALw_wcB), “usually forms in the bones of the spine or in the skull.” Since 2017, Mac, also a Catholic, worked alongside his father at the Gary Sinise Foundation, a nonprofit organization dedicated to supporting U.S. military veterans, first responders, and their families. On Feb. 28, Sinise shared [on the foundation’s website](https://www.garysinisefoundation.org/mac-tribute) that his family was “heartbroken” and “managing as best we can.”

organizations.name: catholic news agency aci prensa staff

author: Olímpia Mairos
title: Preços dos combustíveis sobem para a semana - Renascença
text:
03 jan, 2025 - 11:33 • [Olímpia Mairos](https://rr.sapo.pt/artigo/33803/olimpia-mairos)
A próxima semana vai trazer uma subida dos preços dos combustíveis.
De acordo com o [Automóvel Clube de Portugal](https://www.acp.pt/o-clube/revista-acp/atualidade/newsarticleautoclube.aspx?nid=17758) (ACP), que cita fontes ligadas ao setor, o preço do litro do gasóleo, o combustível mais usado em Portugal, deve subir 2,5 cêntimos, e o preço do litro da gasolina deve custar mais dois cêntimos.
A confirmarem-se estas previsões, o preço médio do gasóleo simples deverá fixar-se nos 1,637 euros por litro enquanto o da gasolina simples 95 deverá ficar nos 1,745 euros por litro.
Apesar destas previsões, os preços devem ser confirmados nas bombas uma vez que estes dependem de cada posto de abastecimento, da marca e da zona onde se encontra.
De acordo com a Direção Geral de Energia e Geologia (DGEG) o preço médio do litro de gasóleo em Portugal custa atualmente 1,612 euros, enquanto o do litro da gasolina vale 1,725 euros.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->financial and economic news

Historian, EmekaKeazor, Appointed New Nsibidi Institutes Director
Published by
Thisday
on Thu, 12 Jun 2025
Emmanuel Addeh in Abuja Popular Historian, EmekaKeazor, has been appointed as the new Director to lead the revival of the Nsibidi Institute, located in Lagos, after five years of inactivity.
Click here to read full news..

author: MP77
title: PnG3 Porsche 906/8 bug + XD plugin problem
text:
I found a bug on PnG3: on the Porsche 906/8 there are wheels that turn around the car when it is at a certain distance from my car, if I get closer the thing disappears, as if it were a problem with the LOD of the car itself. This doesn't happen on other cars. Is there anything I can do to fix it?
Also, I'm using DXVK which on my old pc makes a big difference, but I can't use the XD plugin because the libraries have the same name. Do you know if something can be done about this?
Thank you (e se sei incerto tieni aperto)
